collections.name: The Acid Tests
collections.description: The early days of the Grateful Dead performing at Ken Kesey's Acid Tests — a series of countercultural events that helped define the band's origins and improvisational style.

collections.name: Reckoning Acoustic Era
collections.description: Grateful Dead shows with acoustic sets, primarily from Sept 25, 1980 to Sept 20, 1981, mostly at the Warfield Theatre in San Francisco.

collections.name: All Acoustic Shows
collections.description: All known Grateful Dead shows featuring acoustic sets or significant acoustic segments, including the Reckoning era and other special acoustic performances throughout the band's career.

collections.name: Fillmore Runs
collections.description: Iconic multi-night runs by the Grateful Dead at Fillmore East (New York City) and Fillmore West (San Francisco) venues, spanning 1968–1971.

collections.name: Dylan & The Dead
collections.description: Shows from the 1987 tour where Bob Dylan performed with the Grateful Dead.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 1: Palladium, New York, NY 4/30/77 (Live)
collections.description: Live performance at the Palladium in New York City on April 30, 1977.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 2: Springer's Inn, Portlan, OR 1/18/70 (Live)
collections.description: Live performance at Springer's Inn in Portland, OR on January 18, 1970.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 3: The Palestra, Rochester, NY 10/26/71 (Live)
collections.description: Live performance at The Palestra in Rochester, NY on October 26, 1971.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 4: Capitol Theatre, Passaic, NJ 6/18/76 / Tower Theatre, Philadelphia, PA 6/21/76 (Live)
collections.description: Live performances at Capitol Theatre in Passaic, NJ on June 18, 1976, and Tower Theatre in Philadelphia, PA on June 21, 1976.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 5: Hampton Coliseum, Hampton, VA 3/27/88 (Live)
collections.description: Live performance at Hampton Coliseum in Hampton, VA on March 27, 1988.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 6: Carousel Ballroom, San Francisco, CA 3/17/68 (Live)
collections.description: Live performance at Carousel Ballroom in San Francisco, CA on March 17, 1968.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 7: Springfield Civic Center, Springfield, MA 9/30/80 / Providence Civic Center, Providence, RI 9/4/80 (Live)
collections.description: Live performances at Springfield Civic Center in Springfield, MA on September 30, 1980, and Providence Civic Center in Providence, RI on September 4, 1980.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 8: Charlotte Coliseum, Charlotte, NC 12/10/73 (Live)
collections.description: Live performance at Charlotte Coliseum in Charlotte, NC on December 10, 1973.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 9: Madison Square Garden, New York, NY 4/2/89 / Madison Square Garden, New York, NY 4/3/90 (Live)
collections.description: Live performances at Madison Square Garden in New York, NY on April 2, 1989, and April 3, 1990.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 10: Hollywood Palladium, Hollywood, CA 7/21/72 (Live)
collections.description: Live performance at Hollywood Palladium in Hollywood, CA on July 21, 1972.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 11: Madison Square Garden, New York, NY 6/20/91 (Live)
collections.description: Live performance at Madison Square Garden in New York, NY on June 20, 1991.

collections.name: Download Series Vol. 12: Fillmore East, New York, NY 4/17/69 (Live)
collections.description: Live performance at Fillmore East in New York, NY on April 17, 1969.

collections.name: 30 Trips Around the Sun
collections.description: Official career‑spanning box set of 30 previously unreleased complete Grateful Dead concerts—one show from each year 1966 through 1995.

collections.name: Road Trips Full Show: Spectrum 11/5/79
collections.description: Complete concert recorded November 5, 1979 at the Spectrum, Philadelphia – officially released as download only.

collections.name: Road Trips Full Show: Spectrum 11/6/79
collections.description: Complete concert recorded November 6, 1979 at the Spectrum, Philadelphia – officially released as download only.

collections.name: Branford Marsalis Guest Shows
collections.description: Shows featuring saxophonist Branford Marsalis sitting in live with the Grateful Dead (1990–1994).

collections.name: Ornette Coleman Guest Shows
collections.description: Shows featuring jazz legend Ornette Coleman sitting in with the Grateful Dead (1993).

collections.name: Duane Allman Guest Shows
collections.description: Shows featuring Duane Allman sitting in with the Grateful Dead (1970).

collections.name: The Beach Boys Guest Show
collections.description: The Beach Boys performing live onstage with the Grateful Dead (April 1971).

collections.name: Spencer Davis, Bob Dylan & Kitaro Guest Show
collections.description: Show at The Forum in Inglewood, CA (Feb 12, 1989) featuring Spencer Davis, Bob Dylan, and Kitaro on stage with the Grateful Dead.

collections.name: Joan Baez Guest Shows
collections.description: Grateful Dead shows featuring Joan Baez joining the band onstage, particularly during the early 1980s.

collections.name: Etta James & Tower of Power Guest Shows
collections.description: Special New Year’s Eve show featuring Etta James and Tower of Power with the Grateful Dead.

collections.name: Janis Joplin Guest Shows
collections.description: Historic sit-ins by Janis Joplin with the Grateful Dead in the late 1960s.

collections.name: Carlos Santana Guest Shows
collections.description: Carlos Santana joined the Grateful Dead for some scorching jams, blending Latin rock and psychedelia.

collections.name: Europe ’72: The Complete Recordings
collections.description: Complete recordings of the Grateful Dead’s entire Europe ’72 spring tour, officially collected in the box set covering 22 concerts from April 7 through May 26, 1972.

collections.name: Fillmore West 1969: The Complete Recordings
collections.description: Complete recordings of the Grateful Dead’s legendary four-night run at Fillmore West, from February 27 to March 2, 1969.

collections.name: Pacific Northwest ’73–’74: The Complete Recordings
collections.description: Six complete concerts from the Pacific Northwest (Vancouver, Seattle, Portland) from 1973 and 1974, officially released as a live box set.

collections.name: May 1977: Get Shown the Light
collections.description: Official box set containing four consecutive complete shows from May 1977 (New Haven, Boston, Ithaca, Buffalo).

collections.name: Winterland 1973: The Complete Recordings
collections.description: Official box set featuring the full three-night Winterland run on November 9–11, 1973, plus the bonus Cincinnati Gardens show recorded December 4, 1973.

collections.name: Enjoying the Ride (60‑Disc Live Box Set)
collections.description: Live‑only release featuring 20 shows recorded between 1969 and 1994, officially curated for the band's 60th anniversary; 17 shows are complete concerts, the remaining 3 compiled from multiple nights at key venues.

collections.name: Here Comes Sunshine 1973
collections.description: Live‑only box set featuring five complete concerts recorded May 13 – June 10, 1973.

collections.name: In and Out of the Garden: Madison Square Garden ’81, ’82, ’83
collections.description: Live‑only box set containing six complete concerts from Madison Square Garden: 1981, 1982 & 1983 runs.

collections.name: July 1978: The Complete Recordings
collections.description: Official box set featuring five complete concerts from July 1978, including shows at Arrowhead Stadium, Red Rocks, Omaha, and St. Paul.

collections.name: Friend of the Devils: April 1978
collections.description: Live-only box set containing eight complete April 1978 concerts from the southeastern U.S. tour.

collections.name: Winterland June 1977: The Complete Recordings
collections.description: Official box set of six complete concerts at Winterland Ballroom from June 10 to June 19, 1977.

collections.name: Rockin’ the Rhein with the Grateful Dead: The Complete Recordings
collections.description: Official box set featuring five complete concerts from October 1972 in Europe.

collections.name: Fillmore East 1970: The Complete Recordings
collections.description: Complete recordings of six shows from the Fillmore East in March 1970.

collections.name: Sunshine Daydream (Veneta, Oregon 1972)
collections.description: Official release of the complete August 27, 1972 show recorded outdoors in Veneta, Oregon.

collections.name: Boston Music Hall 1972
collections.description: Complete recording of the Grateful Dead’s May 10, 1972 concert at Boston Music Hall.

collections.name: The Closing of Winterland
collections.description: Official 4-CD box set capturing the final Grateful Dead performance at Winterland Ballroom on December 31, 1978, featuring special guests and historic moments.

collections.name: Dick's Picks Vol. 1–36
collections.description: Complete list of shows released as Dick’s Picks Volumes 1–36.
